serialport_poller.h

Copyright (C) 2013 Robert Giseburt giseburt@gmail.com serialport_poller.h Written as a part of https://github.com/voodootikigod/node-serialport License to use this is the same as that of node-serialport.

 
#ifndef SERIALPORT_POLLER_H
#define SERIALPORT_POLLER_H

#include <nan.h>
#include "./serialport.h"

class SerialportPoller : public Nan::ObjectWrap {
 public:
  static void Init(v8::Handle<v8::Object> target);

  void callCallback(int status);

  void _start();
  void _stop();

 private:
  SerialportPoller();
  ~SerialportPoller();

  static NAN_METHOD(New);
  static NAN_METHOD(Close);
  static NAN_METHOD(Start);

  uv_poll_t poll_handle_;
  int fd_;
  char errorString[ERROR_STRING_SIZE];

  Nan::Callback* callback_;
};

#endif
